r.d: This extension embeds a Handlebars interpreter into PHP, allowing the execution of Handlebars templates.
r.n: - PHP 8.1 and 8.2 compat - Target handlebars.js v4.7.7 - Target handlebars.c v1.0.0 - Objects can now be iterated with `#each` - `known_helpers` is now passed properly to the compiler in `render`
